original_text: Hollow with boards shalt thou make it: as it was shewed thee in the mount, so shall they make it.
korean_text: 제단은 널판으로 속이 비게 만들되 산에서 네게 보인 대로 그들이 만들게 하라

sentences.original_text: Hollow with boards shalt thou make it:
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 널빤지로 속이 비게 그것을 만들지니라

sentences.original_text: as it was shewed thee in the mount,
